plot: Late at night, in the twilight hours. Pear and Banana are spooning in bed, their bodies snuggling as close as they possibly can be. It is the morning after their first night together. A short, delicate love story.
title: Banana & Pear: The Movie
plot_es: Late at night, in the twilight hours. Pear and Banana are spooning in bed, their bodies snuggling as close as they possibly can be. It is the morning after their first night together. A short, delicate love story.
plot_en: Late at night, in the twilight hours. Pear and Banana are spooning in bed, their bodies snuggling as close as they possibly can be. It is the morning after their first night together. A short, delicate love story.
